text: Jerry March, Ph.D. (August 1, 1929 – December 25, 1997) was an American organic chemist and a professor of chemistry at Adelphi University. March authored the March's Advanced Organic Chemistry text, which is considered to be a pillar of graduate-level organic chemistry texts. The book was prepared in its fifth edition at the time of his death. == External links == * New York Times obituary Category:Organic chemists Category:1929 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Adelphi University faculty
title: Jerry March
